paragraphs.body: The cover of The Complete Book 2 Collection features the ${link_0}' main characters.
paragraphs.text: The cover of The Complete Book 2 Collection features the series' main characters.

paragraphs.body: The Complete Book 2 Collection is the boxed set of DVDs containing all twenty episodes from ${link_0}. The Region 1 release contains special features and an exclusive bonus disc, which are absent from both the Region 2 and Region 4 releases.
paragraphs.text: The Complete Book 2 Collection is the boxed set of DVDs containing all twenty episodes from Book Two: Earth. The Region 1 release contains special features and an exclusive bonus disc, which are absent from both the Region 2 and Region 4 releases.
